headline: EDWARDS DRY VACUUM PUMP 64.6 CFM
description: Dry Vacuum Pump With Q-Series Controller           Edwards QDP80
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Edwards
Model QDP80 w/ Q-Series Controller
Dry Pump YES
Pumping Speed 64.6 CFM (1,825.4 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 2.25E-2(En) torr (3.00E-2 mbar)
Inlet Flange ISO-K 63.0 mm (2.480 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Motor Horsepower 4.0 HP
Accessories

Gas module
Exhaust pressure module
Extractable enclosure
Q-Series controller
Cables included

Power Requirements 200-208 V 60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 17.000 in (43.2 cm)
Depth 40.000 in (101.6 cm)
Height 21.000 in (53.3 cm)
Weight 678 lb (308 kg)
